original_text:
“Remember: who that was innocent ever perished?
    Or where were the upright cut off?
korean_text: 생각하여 보라 죄 없이 망한 자가 누구인가 정직한 자의 끊어짐이 어디 있는가

sentences.original_text: who that was innocent ever perished?
sentences.korean_translation: 죄 없는 자가 멸망한 적이 있었는가?

sentences.original_text: Or where were the upright cut off?
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 정직한 자들이 끊어진 곳이 어디인가?
